aboutUs.title: About us :
aboutUs.content: Varni Tech is an automation company that specializes in automation solutions for businesses. Our mission is to empower companies to optimize their processes and achieve greater efficiency through the use of cutting-edge technology. We believe that the key to success in the fast-paced digital age is the ability to automate repetitive tasks and free up employees to focus on more impactful projects. Our team is dedicated to helping our clients achieve their goals and drive success for their business. We understand the importance of employee satisfaction and strive to create a work environment where everyone feels valued and motivated to do their best work. We also recognize the importance of time management and work diligently to deliver projects on-time and within budget. Our goal is to be your trusted partner for all your automation needs, and to help you drive growth and success for your business.

cards.title: Full Stack Developer (Django & React)
cards.description: We are nd experienced Full Stack Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both Django and React, as well as experience with web development best practices. The Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our web applications and services.
duties: Design, develop, and maintain web applications and services using Django and React
Collaborate with the development team to design and implement new features and functionality
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
Participate in code reviews and ensure that all code adheres to company standards
Troubleshoot and debug issues as needed
Keep up-to-date with the latest web development trends and technologies
requirements: 3+ years of experience in web development
Strong experience with Django and React
Experience with web development best practices, including version control (Git), testing, and code review
Strong understanding of web technologies, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery
Experience with databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and ORM (Django ORM)
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
Strong communication and collaboration skills
Experience with Elasticsearch and Celery is a plus
niceToHave: Experience with Elasticsearch and Celery is a plus
